mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_id AS qnaId, q.title, q.question, q.is_public AS isPublic, q.create_date AS createDate, s.name AS writerName FROM qna q JOIN lecture_enrollment le ON q.enrollment_id = le.enrollment_id JOIN student s ON le.student_id = s.student_id ORDER BY q.qna_id DESC
SELECT title, qna_id AS qnaId, question, is_public AS isPublic, create_date AS createDate FROM qna WHERE qna_id = #{qnaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (title, enrollment_id, question, is_public) VALUES (#{enrollmentId}, #{question}, #{isPublic})
mapper.select: SELECT le.student_id FROM qna q JOIN lecture_enrollment le ON q.enrollment_id = le.enrollment_id WHERE q.qna_id = #{qnaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_answer (qna_id, answer, create_date) VALUES (#{qnaId}, #{answer}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT answer_id AS answerId, qna_id AS qnaId, answer, create_date AS createDate FROM qna_answer WHERE qna_id = #{qnaId} ORDER BY create_date ASC
